meanings.sent1: The tree had a dissymmetric shape, with one side much larger than the other.
meanings.sent2: The dissymmetric design of the building made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetric cake looked like it had been cut by someone with very shaky hands.
meanings.sent4: Her dissymmetric approach to problem-solving always led to unique solutions.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetric clouds in the sky created a dramatic and unbalanced scene.

meanings.sent1: The dissymmetric earrings she wore were a fashion statement.
meanings.sent2: The dissymmetric pattern on the rug added a touch of quirkiness to the room.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetric puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: Their dissymmetric personalities complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetric wings of the butterfly fluttered in an uneven pattern.

meanings.sent1: The dissymmetric rocks on the beach were worn down by the waves.
meanings.sent2: The dissymmetric leaves of the plant gave it a unique and interesting appearance.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetric slices of pizza made it hard to share them equally.
meanings.sent4: The dissymmetric shadows cast by the streetlights created a surreal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetric branches of the tree reached out in all directions, creating a chaotic canopy.
